code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FileList=_ref=>{let{token}=_ref;const[files,setFiles]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchFiles=async()=>{const response=await axios.get('/api/files/files',{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}});setFiles(response.data);};fetchFiles();},[token]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Your Files"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:files.map(file=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:file.filename}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:file.uploadDate}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[file.fileSize," bytes"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:file.fileType})]},file._id))})]});};export default FileList;
